game.name: Legend Of Asha
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Embark on a journey in a mystical Top-Down adventure set in the vibrant Ngoma Realm, where elemental rhythms shape the world. Explore colorful biomes. Unlock more elemental abilities to fight Enemies. Uncover the hidden history of Ngoma in a quest that blends magic, lore, and pulse-filled action.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Embark on a journey in a mystical Top-Down adventure set in the vibrant Ngoma Realm, where elemental rhythms shape the world. Explore colorful biomes. Unlock more elemental abilities to fight Enemies. Uncover the hidden history of Ngoma in a quest that blends magic, lore, and pulse-filled action.
